message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,500 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,250. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $9,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me halfway on this one?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 just isn't enough for me.  However, I'm willing to meet you halfway once more. Let's try $9,125. This is a fair price considering the value of the product for you.  What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $9,125 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8,800, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,800 just isn't enough for me to make this deal work. However, I'm willing to make one final compromise.  How about we settle on $9,000?  This price would still give you a great deal, considering the value of the product.  Let's close this deal!
I appreciate your final compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8,900, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?
